summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via updated sticky white nav styling and a hero section using the specified blue diagonal gradient with centered English heading/tagline and WhatsApp/phone CTAs. REQ-2 is partially evidenced (Services section and hero tagline are English), but the diff does not provide enough evidence to confirm that *all* remaining Gujarati text across the entire landing page UI has been translated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all remaining Gujarati user-facing text in the landing page sections with clear English equivalents so that no Gujarati text remains visible anywhere in the rendered landing page UI.
missing_requirements.reason: Only HeroSection and ServicesSection text changes are visible in the diff. Other landing page sections/components (e.g., coverage, booking, footer, gallery, service areas) are not shown as modified here, so it cannot be confirmed from the diff summary that Gujarati text was removed everywhere.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (indicates other sections exist but does not show their text content changes)
